alert.note: Alert for Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 14 at 2:04AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of south Texas, including the following areas, Aransas Islands, Calhoun Islands, Coastal Aransas, Coastal Calhoun, Coastal Refugio, Goliad, Inland Calhoun, Inland Refugio and Victoria. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Significant flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low lying and flood prone locations is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - An additional 1-3 inches of rainfall is expected with isolated higher amounts. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria
